alert.note: Alert for Charlotte; Halifax (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 2:13PM EST until January 12 at 4:43PM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Virginia... Roanoke (Staunton) River at Randolph affecting Halifax and Charlotte Counties. Dan River at Dan River at Paces affecting Halifax County. Dan River at South Boston affecting Halifax County. For the Roanoke River...including Roanoke, Pigg R Nr Sandy Level, Altavista, Brookneal, Randolph...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Dan River...including Wentworth, STP near Danville, Dan River at Paces, South Boston...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Roanoke (Staunton) River at Randolph. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:45 PM EST Thursday the stage was 27.3 feet. - Bankfull stage is 21.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 1:45 PM EST Thursday was 27.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tonight and continue falling to 10.3 feet Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 24.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 27.3 feet on 08/20/1985. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: When it is safe to do so, please send your reports of flooding, including mudslides or flooded roads, to the National Weather Service by calling toll free at 1...8 6 6...2 1 5...4 3 2 4. Reports and pictures can also be shared on the National Weather Service Blacksburg Facebook page and on Twitter. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 215 AM EST.
